name: 3D Hybrid Concept Car Racing Challenge
description:
number one Free 3D Car Racing game! 3D Hybrid Concept Car Racing Released!
Incredible small size, Real racing competition, Mad tricks and drifting, Online Battle your AI friends playing 3D Hybrid Concept Car Racing ! Driving Ahead, Race to Win!

Features:
• Super Fast 3D Hybrid Concept Car
• Easy controls
• Mad car drifts
• Real racing competition experience
• Upgrades and customize extreme cars
• Small size game but really good graphics and effects
• whole new level speed racing game!

Thanks for your supporting. We will always keep improving.
